alfredsnippet.snippet:
https://books.google.com/books?id=jAH0CwAAQBAJ&pg=PT473&lpg=PT473&dq=Nothing+tends+to+materialise+man,+and+to+deprive+his+work+of+the+faintest+trace+of+mind,+more+than+extreme+division+of+labour.&source=bl&ots=OuyDTTTlp_&sig=H2dM28ApZ1k45JH_WiOCcA92ETg&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj4gcmu_LfWAhXrs1QKHRZrBYoQ6AEIQjAE#v=onepage&f=false

Democracy in America
Alexis de Tocqueville

"Nothing tends to materialise man, and to deprive his work of the faintest trace of mind, more than extreme division of labour."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Extreme Division of Labor
